notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Monthly dengue data were obtained from the DATASUS (a database of the Brazilian public health system): http://www2.datasus.gov.br/DATASUS/index.php?area=0203. Human population data were retrieved from the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE, Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estat√≠stica) for the year 2014: http://www.ibge.gov.br/home/estatistica/populacao/estimativa2014/estimativa_dou.shtm. All the official Brazilian data are publicly available and can be obtained by filling the request form at the Brazilian Government transparency platform ( https://esic.cgu.gov.br/sistema/site/index.aspx). Climate variables were obtained from the Climate Prediction Center's (CPC) rainfall data for the world via raincpc R package and from Reanalysis CFSR model (reference: CREATE-IP.reanalysis.NOAA-NCEP.CFSR.atmos.mon, data node: esgf.nccs.nasa.gov). Monthly vector suitability data are available from: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/kvxs0pe51xpr3xd/AAC1VkxLqObG4hbUosZHE1Yza.
